BBEX3.A.SRD.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Suriname / USD 1 = SRD ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2004 at the rate of SRG 1,000 (Suriname guilder) = SRD 1 (Suriname dollar).
Source: Centrale Bank van Suriname, Paramaribo
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.

Comment on 2011: On 20 January 2011, the exchange rates (buying/selling rate) for the US dollar were changed from USD 1 = SRD 2.710 / 2.780 to USD 1 = SRD 3.250 / 3.350, corresponding to a depreciation of the Suriname dollar against the US dollar of 16.8% (middle rate).
